price: 141 mais aussi afin de purifier l’âme des croyants et d’anéantir les mécréants.
arabic: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَمۡحَقَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waliyumaḥḥiṣa al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayamḥaqa al-kāfirīna
